name: S3-Iris
reasonForDisplacement: Claims she followed a 'fracture seam' visible only to synth optics.
personality: Soft-spoken, unnervingly calm, speaks in metaphors.
questHooks: Says the Humming One is 'not a sound, but a direction'.
Believes Zion is a convergence point for multiple timelines.
Wants to map fracture seams using Atomic Fizz Caps as markers.

lore.interpretation: A gravitational pull toward a future event.
lore.atomicFizzRumors: Fizz Caps glow faintly in her optical spectrum.
